byline.contributor: Nick Bilton contributed reporting from San Francisco.

abstract: Research in Motion disappoints investors and analysts after unveiling little more than a rebranding of what it called its 'next generation platform' for BlackBerry smartphones and tablets at conference intended to persuade app developers to produce software for future devices.
snippet: Analysts were disappointed on Tuesday when Research in Motion unveiled little more than a rebranding of what it called its “next generation platform.”
lead_paragraph: Analysts were disappointed on Tuesday when Research in Motion unveiled little more than a rebranding of what it called its “next generation platform.”

headline.main: RIM Unveils an Upgrade, but Little Else
headline.print_headline: RIM Unveils an Upgrade, but Little Else
